title: Figgy pudding
ingredients: ['250g (8 1/2oz) chopped dried figs', '3 tbsp dark rum', 'grated zest and juice of 1 lemon', '115 g (4 oz) unsalted butter, softened', '115 g (4 oz) dark muscovado sugar', '2 eggs, beaten', '1 dessert apple, peeled and diced', '1 large pear, peeled and diced', '30 g (1 oz) flaked almonds, toasted', '115g (4oz) glace cherries', '2 pieces of stem ginger, chopped', '55 g (2 oz) self-raising flour', '100 g (3½ oz) fresh white breadcrumbs', 'For the rum and ginger sauce', '6 tbsp cornflour', '1½ pints milk', '3 tbsp caster sugar, or to taste', '3 tbsp ginger syrup (from stem ginger jar)', '3 tbsp dark rum', 'grated zest of one lemon']
